javascript.explanation: Missing closing parenthesis ')' after the function arguments.
You have an extra closing brace '}' or a missing opening brace '{'.
javascript.fix: Check that all '{' have a corresponding '}'.

python.explanation: Python indentation error. Check spaces at the beginning of the line.
python.fix: Ensure indentation is consistent (usually 4 spaces per block).

python.explanation: General syntax error. Check parentheses, commas, colons, etc.
python.fix: Review the line indicated and verify the syntax.

java.explanation: Every source file must contain at least one top-level class, interface, or enum.
java.fix: Make sure the code is inside a 'public class ClassName { ... }' declaration.

java.explanation: In Java, many statements must end with a semicolon.
java.fix: Check the end of the indicated line and add ';' if missing.

cpp.explanation: In C++, every declaration must end with a semicolon.
cpp.fix: Add ';' at the end of the line.
Check that all '{' have a corresponding '}'.

go.explanation: Every Go source file must start with a 'package' declaration.
go.fix: Add 'package main' or another package name at the top of the file.

go.explanation: A variable or function name is not recognized.
go.fix: Check the spelling or make sure the variable/function is declared before being used.
